summary.para: Specifies types of scheduling policies for network rate control.
Turns on the control of the network traffic. You must set this value if you also set either JOB_OBJECT_NET_RATE_CONTROL_MAX_BANDWIDTH or JOB_OBJECT_NET_RATE_CONTROL_DSCP_TAG.
Sets the DSCP field in the packet header to the value of the DscpTag member of the structure. For information about DSCP, see Differentiated Services.
The combination of all of the valid flags for the enumeration.
Uses the value of the MaxBandwidth member of the structure to set the maximum bandwidth for outgoing network traffic for the job, in bytes.
